entries.title: Lula breaks down in tears after being sworn in as Brazil’s president
entries.description: Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva was sworn in as Brazil’s president after narrowly beating Jair Bolsonaro in October’s election.

entries.title: Pope Francis prays for Benedict XVI during New Year's Day mass
entries.description: Pope Francis prayed for his predecessor’s passage to heaven during a New Year’s Day Mass in St. Peter’s Basilica, one day after Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI died at age 95.

entries.title: Zelenskyy and Putin promise victory in contrasting New Year speeches
entries.description: The leaders of Ukraine and Russia both vowed to push for victory in New Year speeches.

entries.title: Pope marks New Year as Vatican prepares to mourn Benedict
entries.description: Pope Francis presided over a special New Year’s Day Mass in St. Peter’s Basilica, a day after Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI died in retirement at the Vatican.

entries.title: Watch the New Year’s 2023 celebrations from across the globe
entries.description: The Sydney Harbour Bridge in Australia gleamed with lights, fireworks illuminated the skies above the Champs Elysees in Paris and couples shared midnight kisses in Times Square as many gathered across the globe to ring in the New Year.

entries.title: North Korea to boost nuclear warhead production 'exponentially,' leader says
entries.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un vowed to increase the production of nuclear warheads “exponentially” and build a more powerful intercontinental ballistic
